document_data.name: Diamssar
document_data.basicrefs: {{Cite adventurers league/A City on the Edge|44}}
document_data.refs5e: {{Cite adventurers league/A City on the Edge|47}}
document_data.mainbody: had pale skin and dressed in dark clothes.
document_data.Description: He had pale skin and dressed in dark clothes.
document_data.Personality: Hiss skills with deception hid his true fanatical nature.
document_data.Possessions: He was in possession of a [[potion of healing]] and a jeweled dagger.
document_data.Relationships:
Diamssar worked with the [[Harper]] agent [[Soggy Wren]], whom he had been manipulating into finding the pieces of a [[Dreamer's Amulet]] that had been smuggled into [[Port Nyanzaru]] by his [[yuan-ti]] masters. He was affiliated with [[Lekhet]], a [[yuan-ti pureblood]].

He had a pet [[giant snake|giant poisonous snake]].
document_data.History: During the events of the [[death curse]] around [[1490 DR]], Diamssar was a double agent for a group of [[yuan-ti]] while working as a representative of the Triceratops Society. For the Triceratops Society, he worked outside the [[Public bathhouse (Port Nyanzaru)|public bathhouse]]. His secret yuan-ti business operated out of the abandoned [[Northside Market Textile House]] warehouse in the [[Port Nyanzaru/Market Ward|Market Ward]].
